## IFlyout interface

Interface for a flyout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IFlyout extends IRegistrable, IFocusableTree 
```
**Extends:** [IRegistrable](./blockly.iregistrable.md)<!-- -->, [IFocusableTree](./blockly.ifocusabletree.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoClose](./blockly.iflyout.autoclose.md) |  | boolean | Does the flyout automatically close when a block is created? |
|  [CORNER\_RADIUS](./blockly.iflyout.corner_radius.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Corner radius of the flyout background. |
|  [horizontalLayout](./blockly.iflyout.horizontallayout.md) |  | boolean | Whether the flyout is laid out horizontally or not. |
|  [MARGIN](./blockly.iflyout.margin.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Margin around the edges of the blocks in the flyout. |
|  [RTL](./blockly.iflyout.rtl.md) |  | boolean | Is RTL vs LTR. |
|  [targetWorkspace](./blockly.iflyout.targetworkspace.md) |  | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md) \| null | The target workspace |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createBlock(originalBlock)](./blockly.iflyout.createblock.md) | Create a copy of this block on the workspace. |
|  [createDom(tagName)](./blockly.iflyout.createdom.md) | Creates the flyout's DOM. Only needs to be called once. The flyout can either exist as its own svg element or be a g element nested inside a separate svg element. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.iflyout.dispose.md) | Dispose of this flyout. Unlink from all DOM elements to prevent memory leaks. |
|  [getContents()](./blockly.iflyout.getcontents.md) | Returns the list of flyout items currently present in the flyout. The <code>show</code> method parses the flyout definition into a list of actual flyout items. This method should return those concrete items, which may be used for e.g. keyboard navigation. |
|  [getHeight()](./blockly.iflyout.getheight.md) | Get the height of the flyout. |
|  [getWidth()](./blockly.iflyout.getwidth.md) | Get the width of the flyout. |
|  [getWorkspace()](./blockly.iflyout.getworkspace.md) | Get the workspace inside the flyout. |
|  [getX()](./blockly.iflyout.getx.md) | Calculates the x coordinate for the flyout position. |
|  [getY()](./blockly.iflyout.gety.md) | Calculates the y coordinate for the flyout position. |
|  [hide()](./blockly.iflyout.hide.md) | Hide and empty the flyout. |
|  [init(targetWorkspace)](./blockly.iflyout.init.md) | Initializes the flyout. |
|  [isBlockCreatable(block)](./blockly.iflyout.isblockcreatable.md) | Does this flyout allow you to create a new instance of the given block? Used for deciding if a block can be "dragged out of" the flyout. |
|  [isDragTowardWorkspace(currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.iflyout.isdragtowardworkspace.md) | Determine if a drag delta is toward the workspace, based on the position and orientation of the flyout. This is used in determineDragIntention\_ to determine if a new block should be created or if the flyout should scroll. |
|  [isScrollable()](./blockly.iflyout.isscrollable.md) |  |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.iflyout.isvisible.md) | Is the flyout visible? |
|  [position()](./blockly.iflyout.position.md) | Position the flyout. |
|  [reflow()](./blockly.iflyout.reflow.md) | Reflow blocks and their mats. |
|  [scrollToStart()](./blockly.iflyout.scrolltostart.md) | Scroll the flyout to the beginning of its contents. |
|  [setContainerVisible(visible)](./blockly.iflyout.setcontainervisible.md) | Set whether this flyout's container is visible. |
|  [setVisible(visible)](./blockly.iflyout.setvisible.md) | Set whether the flyout is visible. A value of true does not necessarily mean that the flyout is shown. It could be hidden because its container is hidden. |
|  [show(flyoutDef)](./blockly.iflyout.show.md) | Show and populate the flyout. |
